definition: to sell/to make or carry out (a plan or intrigue etc)
ticket/ballot/banknote/CL:張|张[zhang1]/person held for ransom/amateur performance of Chinese opera/classifier for groups, batches, business transactions

sentences.english: The appearance of the automated collection bus causes a hot discussion in all walks of life.
sentences.chinese: 无人售票车的出现引发了各界人士的热烈讨论。

sentences.english: Passengers without a monthly pass can purchase tickets from coin-operated ticket dispensers.
sentences.chinese: 没有月票的乘客直接到无人售票机前投币购票。

definition: public transportation/mass transit/abbr. for 公共交通[gong1 gong4 jiao1 tong1]
shuttle bus (or train)/train or bus traveling only part of its normal route
departure (of a coach or train)/to dispatch a vehicle
to inspect a ticket/to examine a ballot
bus information board/street sign for a bus stop/bus stop
to use a credit card (or swipe card, smart card etc)
terminus/final stop on rail or bus line
bus/abbr. for 公共汽車|公共汽车[gong1 gong4 qi4 che1]/car belonging to an organization and used by its members (government car, police car, company car etc)/abbr. for 公務用車|公务用车[gong1 wu4 yong4 che1]
